ModMetaData.name: Butcher Mood & prisoner feed fixes
ModMetaData.author: DoctorVanGogh
ModMetaData.description:
Fixes some small bugs in the vanilla base game (robot related) - Butchering a human corpse by a pawn with no 'mood' need (example: a robot) always throws errors and never completes the job - Feeding an incapacitated prisoner with a non-person pawn (example: a robot) from a Nutrient dispenser logs an error
Version: 1.2
